Articles.Content:
So recently I've started to record videos again and now I'm doing a KSP Reborn series. It's mostly going to be me messing round in the Kerbin system at first with trips to other planets later on possibly. The first two videos are already up and I'm in the process of recording a third. Any suggestions on what you'd like to see are welcome. Here are the first two videos:

I'll post episode 3 when it's up. Thank you for your time.

So I have 2 more episodes recorded but fraps didn't register my mic so it's just game audio. Should I upload them and have episode 5 with audio or just skip them and upload episode 3 with 2 new missions and no videos with them?
